top_comments.comment: We have Rao's at Costco in NC. Planning on going this weekend, so I hope it's on sale!

comments_since_last_sample.body: Last week I was at Costco grabbing organic almond milk and got stopped by a guy asking me why am I not getting the Costco almond milk since it’s Bobby approved. I am so happy that more and more people watch your videos and talk to each other at Costco, so cool😄
20% off everything. But NOT. It sucks that he then qualifies the clear statement with verbiage on the screen. Why does everyone have to be that way.
